full_summary:
Restore Forward Procurement Schedule 2023-2024 of Small Boats
==========================

[RFSA- small boats  Solicitation Number: E60MC-190001/M]

### Key Dates

- **Closing Date:** December 27, 2023 @ 14:00 (EST)
- **Publication Date:** July 18, 2023
- **Amendment Date:** November 27, 2023

### Solicitation

- **Title:** Restore Forward Procurement Schedule 2023-2024 of Small Boats
- **GSIN:** N1940 (Small Craft)
- **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
- **Notice Type:** Invitation to Bid (Competitive - Open bidding)
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive Open Bidding
- **Trade Agreement:** None
- **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

### Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada seeks to restore a forward procurement schedule for the supply of small boats. Tenderers must have the necessary qualifications and experience to design, manufacture, test, inspect, maintain, reconstruct, and deliver boats to the required specifications.

### Tendering Information

*   Bidders may submit a bid by the deadline
*   Documents may be submitted in either English or French
*   The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement

### Contact Information

- **Contact Name:** Vicki Robson
- **Email:** [vicki.robson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:vicki.robson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- **Phone:**  (613) 286-4376


### Attachments

Documentation and attachments can be accessed at [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/)

### Region of Opportunities and Delivery:

Delivery locations are available in the following regions of Canada: 
- Canadian Capital Region  
- British Columbia  
- New Brunswick  
- Ontario  
- Northeastern and Northwestern Territories 
- Newfoundland and Labrador  
- Prince Edward Island 
- Nova Scotia 
- Saskatchewan 
- Yukon administration
- Alberta
- Quebec 
- Manitoba 
- Nunavut which is not an exclusive to other list available on cisgederal websites.
